nodes.text: The Harrower was a ZH-25 Questor-class that was present in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War. It was fitted with a dorsal turret-mounted medium laser cannon.

The Harrower appeared in the roleplaying guide Chronicles of the Gatekeeper. According to the guide, the ship belonged either to the Whitescar Syndicate or to the bounty hunters led by Nex Pavros, making its actual ownership unclear.
